tjark.title: Tracing Log-Messages and Exceptions in Distributed Systems
tjark.subtitle: Implementing the W3C Trace Context Standard in .NET Applications
tjark.text: Modern applications tend to shift away from a monolithic towards a distributed infrastructure by design. But how do we trace exceptions and log messages?

tjark.title: Explaining IMDb Movie Review Text Classification
tjark.subtitle: Approximate Text Explanation (ATE)
tjark.text: In order to make the decisions of models and algorithms used in classification and regression comprehensible, different procedures exist. But can we really trust our models?

tjark.title: Top-10 Most expensive words for Airbnb titles in NYC
tjark.subtitle: Top-10 Most expensive words for Airbnb titles in NYC
tjark.text: This article will provide you with general information about the concept of Bag-of-Words and N-Grams. While learning these basic concepts, you will also be provided with code fragments that help to understand the usage of the concepts.
